com.barchart.udt.nio

Class SelectorProviderUDT

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.nio.channels.spi.SelectorProvider
      • com.barchart.udt.nio.SelectorProviderUDT

  • public class SelectorProviderUDT
extends SelectorProvider
    you must use the same system-wide provider instance for the same TypeUDT of UDT channels and UDT selectors;
